lead_paragraph: GOLDSMITH--Barbara. The Trustees and staff of The New York Public Library deeply mourn the passing of Barbara Goldsmith, a dedicated member of the Library family. She joined the Library's Board of Trustees in 1987 and was an active member for many years. She was a generous supporter and a strong advocate for preservation at the Library, where the Barbara Goldsmith Preservation Division bears her name. She served as a member of many key Board committees and on the Executive Committee of the Cullman Center for Scholars and Writers. She was named a Life Trustee in 2006. An accomplished author, she was honored both as a Literary Lion and as a Centennial Lion. We offer our sincere sympathies to all of her family and friends. Evan R. Chesler, Chairman Samuel C. Butler, Catherine Marron, Elizabeth Rohatyn, Marshall Rose, Neil L. Rudenstine Chairmen Emeriti Anthony W. Marx, President 1/3
